comments: This is observed in the June 19 driver. Previously the report tests were blocked by a packaging defect and unfortunately the report tests did not include Thread analysis (1.5). This was discovered while refactoring the tests for the 1.5 use cases. The other report types are working for Thread.

Here is the error message:

I have found the same behaviour in JVMTI Mem analysis xml (also new view in 4.4).
There could be null entries exist in the TI views that is reporting.

the problem is that the trace class object contains null values.  Particularly.

cls.getLoaddedBy() is null.

Therefore when cls.getLoadedBy().getId() is executed a NPE is thrown.

Assigning to eugene since he is responsible for this code.
I found that by using the report toolbar button instead of the context menu this is working. The reports will be generated.

I don't see this as critical for 4.4.0.1 
Moving to 4.4.1
cannot reproduce the problem with 4402 candidate build.
